sen.j: 油小路通（あぶらのこうじどおり）は京都市の主要な南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Abura-no-koji dori Street is one of the major north-south running streets of Kyoto City.
Abura-no-koji dori Street is one of the major north-south streets of Kyoto City.
Abura-no-koji dori Street is one of the major north-south streets of Kyoto City.

sen.j: 平安京の油小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Abura-no-koji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to Abura-no-koji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to Abura-no-koji Street of Heian-kyo.

sen.j: 北は武殿南通から南にのびる。
sen.e: It starts from the Takedonominami-dori Street in the north and stretches south..
sen.cmt: http://web.kyoto-inet.or.jp/people/kurituka/torina.htm,「竹殿南通り」のタイプミスとして訳出しました。
sen.e: It starts from Takedonominami-dori Street in the north and stretches southward.
It starts from Takedonominami-dori Street in the north and stretches southward.

sen.j: 途中紫明通から上立売通まで中断する。
sen.e: It is interrupted between the Shimei-dori Street and the Kamidachiuri-dori Street.
It is interrupted between Shimei-dori Street and Kamidachiuri-dori Street.
It is interrupted between Shimei-dori Street and Kamidachiuri-dori Street.

tit.e: North of the Tokaido Main Line
North of the Tokaido Main Line

sen.j: 紫明通から北は新町通の西で堀川通の東、土地区画整理事業された住宅地をとおる道。
sen.e: The street North of the Shimei-dori Street passes through a residential area, which was created under a land adjustment project, west of the Shinmachi-dori Street and east of the Horikawa-dori Street.
The street north of Shimei-dori Street passes through a residential area, which was created under a land-adjustment project, west of Shinmachi-dori Street and east of Horikawa-dori Street.
The street north of Shimei-dori Street passes through a residential area, which was created under a land-adjustment project, west of Shinmachi-dori Street and east of Horikawa-dori Street.

sen.j: 紫明通から上立売通までの中断区間は一筋東の小川通が西にずれているため油小路通が続いているようにも見える。
sen.e: The interrupted section between the Shimei-dori Street and the Kamidachiuri-dori Street looks as if the Abura-no-koji dori Street continues, because the Ogawa-dori Street, which runs one block east, deviates west.

The interrupted section between Shimei-dori Street and Kamidachiuri-dori Street looks as if Abura-no-koji dori Street continues, because Ogawa-dori Street, which runs one block east, deviates to the west.

The interrupted section between Shimei-dori Street and Kamidachiuri-dori Street looks as if Abura-no-koji dori Street continues, because Ogawa-dori Street, which runs one block east, deviates to the west.

sen.j: 上立売通から南では、堀川通の一筋東で小川通の西の北行一方通行の細い道。
sen.e: The street south of the Kamidachiuri-dori Street is a narrow one-way northbound traffic, running one block east of the Horikawa-dori Street.
The street south of Kamidachiuri-dori Street is a narrow one-way northbound traffic, running one block east of Horikawa-dori Street.
The street south of Kamidachiuri-dori Street is a narrow, one-way northbound traffic, running one block east of Horikawa-dori Street and west of Ogawa-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 小川通り西を追加しました。

sen.j: 東海道本線をくぐるガードの北で堀川通と合流し、南部の幹線道路となる。
sen.e: It merges with the Horikawa-dori Street at the north side of the railway bridge of the Tokaido Main Line.
It merges with Horikawa-dori Street at the north side of the railway bridge of the Tokaido Main Line.
It merges with Horikawa-dori Street at the north side of the railway bridge of the Tokaido Main Line.

tit.e: South from the Tokaido Main Line
South from the Tokaido Main Line

sen.j: 東海道本線を潜るすぐ北で合流したのちは堀川通と連続した幹線道路を形成し、京都外環状線に至る。
sen.e: After the merging point just north of the railway bridge, it forms a highway that continues from the Horikwa-dori Street, leading to Kyoto-sotokanjo-sen Belt Line.
After the merging point just north of the railway bridge, it forms a highway that continues from Horikawa-dori Street, leading to the Kyoto-sotokanjo-sen Belt Line.
After the merging point just north of the railway bridge of the Tokaido Main Line, it forms a highway that continues from Horikawa-dori Street, leading to the Kyoto-sotokanjo-sen Belt Line.
sen.cmt: Tokaido main lineを追加しました。

sen.j: 上部は阪神高速道路8号京都線が通っている。
sen.e: The Hanshin Expressway Kyoto-sen 8 Go runs over it.
The Hanshin Expressway Kyoto-sen 8 Go runs over it.
Hanshin Expressway Route 8 Kyoto Line runs over it.
sen.cmt: Hanshin Expressway Route 8 Kyoto Lineとしました。

sen.j: 外環状線との交差点以南は、国道1号第二京阪道路となっており、久世郡久御山町から第二京阪道路につながっている。
sen.e: The section south of the intersection with the Kyoto-sotokanjo-sen Belt Line is National Highway Route 1 Daini-Keihan-Doro Bypass, which is connected to Daini-Keihan-Doro Bypass at Kumiyama Town, Kuse-gun.

The section south of the intersection with the Kyoto-sotokanjo-sen Belt Line is National Highway Route 1 Daini-Keihan-Doro Bypass, which is connected to Daini-Keihan-Doro Bypass at Kumiyama Town, Kuse-gun.
The section south of the intersection with the Kyoto-sotokanjo-sen Belt Line is National Route 1 Daini-Keihan-Doro Bypass, which is connected to Daini-Keihan-Doro Bypass at Kumiyama Town, Kuse-gun.

sen.j: 京都南大橋と洛南道路の開通により、慢性的な国道1号の渋滞が大幅に緩和された。
sen.e: The opening of Kyoto Minami Ohashi Bridge and Rakunan Road has reduced chronic congestions of National Highway route No. 1.
The opening of Kyoto Minami Ohashi Bridge and Rakunan Road has reduced the chronic congestion of National Highway Route No. 1.
The opening of Kyoto Minami Ohashi Bridge and Rakunan Road has reduced the chronic congestion of National Route 1.

sen.j: また同時期に開通した京都第二外環状道路や京滋バイパス・名神高速道路の連絡ルートによる強い相乗作用が加わり、周辺区域の交通事情が改善した。
sen.e: Opening of the Kyoto-daini-soto-kanjo-doro Belt Line around the same time and the access route to the Keiji Bypass and Meishin Expressway has also have had strong multiple effects on the improvements of traffic conditions around neighboring areas.

The opening of the Kyoto-daini-soto-kanjo-doro Belt Line around the same time and the access route to the Keiji Bypass and Meishin Expressway have also have had multiple strong effects on the improvement of traffic conditions around neighboring areas.

The opening of the Kyoto-daini-soto-kanjo-doro Belt Line around the same time and the access route to the Keiji Bypass and Meishin Expressway have also had multiple strong effects on the improvement of traffic conditions around neighboring areas.

sen.j: 従来の油小路通から延伸された部分でもあるので、「新油小路通」とも称される。
sen.e: Some call this section Shin Aburanokoji-dori Street, because it is extended from the traditional Aburanokoji-dori Street.
Some call this section Shin Aburanokoji-dori Street because it is extended from the traditional Aburanokoji-dori Street.
Some call this section 'Shin Abura-no-koji-dori Street' (New Abura-no-koji dori Street) because it is an extension of the traditional Abura-no-koji dori Street.
sen.cmt: (New Abura-no-koji dori Street) 補足追加しました。

sen.j: また伏見区内を中心に、正式名称ではないものの「新堀川通」（略して「しんほり」とも）と呼ばれることもあり、沿線の店においても「新堀川店」と称しているものが目立つ。
sen.e: Others call the section, in particular around Fushimi Ward, Shin-horikawa-dori; remarkable numbers of shops name themselves Shin-horikawa branch.
Others call the section (particularly around Fushimi ward) Shin-horikawa-dori, and remarkable numbers of shops refers to them themselves as Shin-horikawa branches.
Others call the section (particularly around Fushimi Ward) 'Shin-horikawa-dori' (New Horikawa-dori), and many shops refer to themselves as 'Shin-horikawa branches.'
sen.cmt: (New Horikawa-dori) 補足追加しました

sen.j: 交差する道路などの特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
